group.name: Typesense
group.description: Nodes to utilize the Typesense functionality.

apiKey.description: The TypeSense API Key for authentication. Get your API Key from the [TypeSense Dashboard](https://cloud.typesense.org/).
apiKey.title: API Key

document.description:
The document to insert into the collection.

**SAMPLE INPUT:**
```
{ 'id': '1', 'name': 'Jon Snow', 'email': 'jonsnow@gmail.com' }
```
document.title: Document

host.description:
The `Node` mentioned on the TypeSense Dashboard is your host.

**EXAMPLE:**
```
1234ab6cd1efghjkl-1.a1.typesense.net
```
host.title: Host

collectionName.description: Name of the Typesense collection to add the document.
collectionName.title: Collection Name

meta.name: Add Document
meta.description:
Creates or uses an existing Typesense collection to insert a document, utilizing provided schema and authentication details.
[TypeSense API](https://typesense.org/docs/latest/api/)

group.name: Typesense
group.description: Nodes to utilize the Typesense functionality.

schemaFields.description:
The schema for your collection. [Learn More](https://typesense.org/docs/0.25.2/api/collections.html#create-a-collection).

**EXAMPLE:**
```
[
    { name: 'title', type: 'string' },
    { name: 'body', type: 'string' },
    { name: 'author', type: 'string' },
    { name: 'tags', type: 'string[]', facet: true },
    { name: 'published_at', type: 'int32', optional: true, sortable: true },
  ]
```
schemaFields.title: Schema Fields

apiKey.description: The TypeSense API Key for authentication. Get your API Key from the [TypeSense Dashboard](https://cloud.typesense.org/).
apiKey.title: API Key

host.description:
The `Node` mentioned on the TypeSense Dashboard is your host.

**EXAMPLE:**
```
1234ab6cd1efghjkl-1.a1.typesense.net
```
host.title: Host

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to create.
collectionName.title: Collection Name

meta.name: Create Collection
meta.description: Create a new Typesense collection with the specified schema

group.name: Typesense
group.description: Nodes to utilize the Typesense functionality.

apiKey.description: The TypeSense API Key for authentication. Get your API Key from the [TypeSense Dashboard](https://cloud.typesense.org/).
apiKey.title: API Key

field.description:
The Field to search the Query with.

**SAMPLE INPUT:**
`name`
field.title: Field

query.description:
The query to search in the collection.

**SAMPLE INPUT:**
`Jon Snow`
query.title: Query

host.description:
The `Node` mentioned on the TypeSense Dashboard is your host.

**EXAMPLE:**
```
1234ab6cd1efghjkl-1.a1.typesense.net
```
host.title: Host

collectionName.description: The name of the collection you want to search.
collectionName.title: Collection Name

meta.name: Full Text Search
meta.description: Performs a full text search on a specified collection in Typesense.

group.name: Typesense
group.description: Nodes to utilize the Typesense functionality.

meta.name: Geo Search
meta.description: Performs a geo-location based search in Typesense using specified parameters.

apiKey.description: The TypeSense API Key for authentication. Get your API Key from the [TypeSense Dashboard](https://cloud.typesense.org/).
apiKey.title: API Key

searchQuery.description: The search query string. Defaults to '*'. [Learn more](https://typesense.org/docs/0.24.0/api/geosearch.html#geosearch)
searchQuery.title: Search Query

host.description:
The `Node` mentioned on the TypeSense Dashboard is your host.

**EXAMPLE:**
```
1234ab6cd1efghjkl-1.a1.typesense.net
```
host.title: Host

sortBy.description:
The sorting criteria. Leave empty for default sorting.

**SAMPLE INPUT:**
```
location(48.853, 2.344):asc
```
sortBy.title: Sort By

location.description:
The base location for the search in 'latitude, longitude' format.

**SAMPLE INPUT:**
```
48.90615915923891, 2.3435897727061175
```
location.title: Location

radius.description:
The search radius around the location in kilometers.

**SAMPLE INPUT:**
`5.1`
radius.title: Radius

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to search within.
collectionName.title: Collection Name

output.description: The search results from the Typesense vector search.
output.title: Search Results

group.name: Typesense
group.description: Nodes to utilize the Typesense functionality.

apiKey.description: The TypeSense API Key for authentication. Get your API Key from the [TypeSense Dashboard](https://cloud.typesense.org/).
apiKey.title: API Key

searchQuery.description: The search query string. Defaults to '*' to search all.
searchQuery.title: Search Query

host.description:
The `Node` mentioned on the TypeSense Dashboard is your host.

**EXAMPLE:**
```
1234ab6cd1efghjkl-1.a1.typesense.net
```
host.title: Host

vector.description: The vector array to search for nearest neighbors.
vector.title: Vector

sortBy.description: Attribute to sort the results by after ranking by vector similarity. Leave empty for default behavior.
sortBy.title: Sort By

k.description: Number of nearest neighbors to find.
k.title: K

vectorField.description: The name of the vector field to query against.
vectorField.title: Vector Field

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to search.
collectionName.title: Collection Name

meta.name: Vector Search
meta.description: Perform a vector search in a Typesense collection and return the results.
